column4: you say to stat the install and when i get to selecting the network to hit Alt-F2 and use "install modules=ppp-udeb" and switch to Alt-F1 and continue the installation?
right, because it needs to load the FS to access the modules, and that is done after, not before, so you can choose any and still access tty2 and do it manually
ook...i'll give it a try...hope to be back next time using ubuntu :)
